sentences.en: "I shall go, leave him." Laura Stebbing stopped, her eyes glistening.
sentences.cn: “我要走，离开他。”劳拉·斯特宾停了下来，眼里闪烁着光芒。

sentences.en: A thin, glistening thread of moisture ran along the rough concrete sill.
sentences.cn: 在粗糙不平的水泥窗台上有一条细细的发光水印。

sentences.en: After a moment he looked up with a slow smile, his eyes glistening.
sentences.cn: 停了一会他抬起头慢慢地一笑, 眼睛里闪着泪花.

sentences.en: After all these years and so many changes, however, the main focus of the FIFA World Cup™ remains the same - the glistening golden trophy, which is the embodiment of every footballer's ambition.
sentences.cn: 在经历了这么多年的发展和改变，然而FIFA世界杯的主旨仍然没有改变，那就是--闪耀的冠军金杯，每个足球选手的雄心的化身。

sentences.en: Darcy's face was white and glistening with sweat.
sentences.cn: 达西脸色苍白，汗珠晶莹。

sentences.en: He gave a tug at a glistening, pale piece of her hair.
sentences.cn: 他拉了拉安娜一缕暗淡闪光的头发.

sentences.en: Her eyes were glistening with tears.
sentences.cn: 她眼里闪着晶莹的泪花。

sentences.en: Her eyes were glistening with tears.
sentences.cn: 她眼睛中的泪水闪着柔和的光.

sentences.en: Here is a normal cervix with a smooth, glistening mucosal surface.
sentences.cn: 图示:正常宫颈, 粘膜表面平滑.

sentences.en: In the shallow waters off Hokkaido, a barbed poacher crawls across glistening volcanic sand on spiny pectoral fins.
sentences.cn: 在北海道外的浅水水域，一只带刺的入侵者利用胸鳍刺爬过闪亮的火山砂。

sentences.en: It shall not be a glistening film that covers a wound, but an eyelid that guards the eye.
sentences.cn: 它不应是遮掩伤口的闪亮的薄膜，而应是保护眼睛的眼睑。

sentences.en: Once she looked up, her even teeth glistening through her smiling lips , her eyes alight.
sentences.cn: 一次她抬起目光, 微笑的嘴唇里,匀称齐整的贝齿在闪闪发光, 眼睛也在闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Outside, where the garden was yesterday, there is now a white and glistening level.
sentences.cn: 外面, 昨天的花园, 现在却是光辉皎洁的一片.

sentences.en: She could see his face now, his eyes wild and his skin glistening with perspiration.
sentences.cn: 她现在可以看见他的脸了，他的眼睛瞪得溜圆，皮肤上闪着汗水。

sentences.en: The glistening roofs of the still slumbering houses were sharply outlined against the twilight sky.
sentences.cn: 仍在沉睡中的房舍之闪亮的屋顶,在黎明的天空中,很清楚地露出轮廓来.

sentences.en: The smooth, glistening pleural surface of a lung is shown here.
sentences.cn: 光滑 、 有光泽的脏层胸膜表面.

sentences.en: There was a sweep of glistening snow on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 山坡上有一片连绵的闪闪发亮的积雪.

sentences.en: There was only a trace of water glistening on the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 小蟹不见了,桌面上只滚动着几粒水珠.

words.tran_cn: 闪亮的；闪耀的；白花花的
反光，闪耀（glisten的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 湿物闪耀，闪亮( glisten的现在分词 )
